website_summaries.verdict: The premier name in German cameras creates an inexpensive and versatile instant model that lets photographers capture important moments and print them on the spot.
pros: Excellent quality for an instant camera
Printed photos are about the size of a business card
Can use whatever film size fits, either color or black and white
Good size for travelers wanting immediate results
cons: No capability to save photos to a memory card
Shutter release is a different orientation than other cameras and may take some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: A nicer Neo 90, aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This is a Fujifilm Neo 90, from a feature-set/capability aspect. That being said, it looks SO much nicer than that camera. And it's a "Leica". I say it like that because, it's the most affordable Leica you can buy... it doesn't have Leica optics, or anything that makes a classic (or modern) Leica a LEICA. Regardless, if you're a fan of aesthetics, and instax exposures, this might work out for you. But it is really, seriously, internally identical to the Fujifilm Neo 90. Works with mini instax film, Fuji or Leica made.
customer_reviews.author: ZD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, fun camera-- that breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera, but only got the chance to shoot 3 rolls on film on it before it stopped working for no apparent reason. It only displays an "E" message on the rear screen, indicating error. Restarting the camera, changing the film, nothing resolves the error message. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Reeve

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but really not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this camera and the pictures it produces, however after owning this for more than a year and having it breakdown (repair costs were $75) for seemingly no reason. I can't recommend anyone buy this camera especially given the insides are almost identical to the Fuji models. Go buy the Fuji models over this, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Quality of camera is great. Pictures are very good quality. Use Fuji InstaMax Mini film both color and black and white and you get really sharp pictures. See reviews of the film.
customer_reviews.author: Dagger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Really nice color and really fun to use
customer_reviews.author: vava

customer_reviews.title: Product Damage
customer_reviews.text: When it open appears damage from a side, its the metal part of the item where the strap hung at the side
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Mayorga

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved the camera for the first two canisters of film, but after traveling with it for two weeks, it refused to turn on with a fully charged battery. Don't buy this camera if you want something that will last!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she loves it. Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Well done Leica
customer_reviews.text: Was taking pics within minutes of taking it out of the box. You'll need to experiment with using flash.
customer_reviews.author: TPAnnArbor

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing camera, I am not a photography expert but the quality and the fact that you can use Fujifilm film pack, make this product an amazing option.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and it has been getting used a lot. No complaints at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jareth

customer_reviews.title: Wooo I love this!!
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer looking than instax. Just my opinion! Leica’s are quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Lannie Jolaine

customer_reviews.title: It's a Leica, but it's really a Fuji.
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pics. Looks great. Was it worth the money? Hmm...well, I gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hyme Dagreat

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't say how much better this is than the Fuji it's based upon
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't say how much better this is than the Fuji it's based upon, but I am thrilled with the images. This is a considerably better camera that the Impossible I-1. My only gripes are the quirky ergonomics of the shutter release and the unintuitive vertical orientation of the shutter release (backwards) but one adjusts quickly to that. The optics, battery life and results are fun...and the design of the camera is exactly what you'd expect from Leica.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan O. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in how flimsy this is
customer_reviews.text: For something so pricey, I'm incredibly disappointed in how flimsy this camera is. I thought that at least the shell would be more robust than competitors! The wiring/casing for the battery has broken, even though I have taken real care with this item (never dropped). Now I have to hold actual battery and put pressure on it to take a photo. It's ridiculous. Do yourself a favor and just purchase a Fujifilm or something.
customer_reviews.author: ac269

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purchase this year!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Love it!!!! Love it!!!! Beautiful color, great pictures, nice size. Love the strap. It's so easy to use. I'm glad I got this color.
customer_reviews.author: MS. HUTTON

product_meta.title: Leica Sofort Instant Camera, Orange
product_meta.description: Color:Orange| Product Packaging:Standard PackageLeica Sofort is an instant camera designed to capture those spontaneous moments in life. Your ideal creative companion, This versatile camera makes the perfect photographic partner at festivals, gigs, parties and more, capturing mini-sized memories to be shared forever. find the styleto match your personality The perfect combination of style and functionality in the small and compact Leica Sofort Digital camera makes it the ideal companion for fashion-conscious people who love photography. It comes in a choice of cool and contemporary colors – Orange, mint and white. What’s your color? lithium-ion battery (supplied) voltage/capacity: 3.7V, 740mAh, 2.6 whbattery life (approx.): 100 pictures at 20°
